doc.title: Line Dance 101: A Quick Start Guide to Line Dancing
doc.plot: Shawn Trautman takes the viewer as an absolute beginner and walks them through all of the steps found in line dancing, from a walking step to "Apple jacks" and Monterey Turns. He teaches these steps in the context of 5 of the most useful line dances done today: the Electric Slide, Cotton-eyed Joe, Slappin' Leather, Ole', and Swing Time. By the time you've mastered these steps, you are ready to hit the dance floor with confidence.
